title: I hate surrender
body: I don't care how badly my teams losing I want to fight to the end and I get annoyed when the enemy denies me the right to a true victory by surrendering.

replies.body: Some of us would rather go into our next match and go on with life rather then waste time because of some stupid notion that surrendering is any different from losing the nexus. It's not, there is no true victory, you still lose.

> [{quoted}](name=Moomookittypaws,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ty4IJxMZ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-09T06:22:16.154+0000)
>
> Some of us would rather go into our next match and go on with life rather then waste time because of some stupid notion that surrendering is any different from losing the nexus. It's not, there is no true victory, you still lose.

And I choose how I lose I would rather fight till I die then kill myself.
People like u waste alots of time by fighting a landslide and hoping for a miracle of 0.1%.

> [{quoted}](name=TheDemonEmperor,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ty4IJxMZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-08T13:23:52.424+0000)
>
> People like u waste alots of time by fighting a landslide and hoping for a miracle of 0.1%.

I didn't say anything about me hoping to win, I know I've lost if my bot has fed an Akali 15 kills or something but regardless I'll still want to fight to the end.
True im like that as well but what can you do XD . . . . but the odds are in our favour seeing as if 3 surrender and 2 dont the surrender fails so keep that in mind and gl in future games mate
